original_text: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies: thou also hast lifted me up on high above them that rose up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
korean_text: 나를 원수들에게서 이끌어 내시며 나를 대적하는 자 위에 나를 높이시고 나를 강포한 자에게서 건지시는도다

sentences.original_text: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분은 나를 내 원수들에게서 이끌어내시며:

sentences.original_text: thou also hast lifted me up on high
above them that rose up against me:
thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
